newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: China, Sri Lanka renew Hong Kong visa exemption.
newsitem.headline: China, Sri Lanka renew Hong Kong visa exemption.

text.p: China and Sri Lanka on Friday signed an agreement to exempt Sri Lankans and Hong Kong passport holders from visa requirements after the British colony's handover to China.
The Foreign Affairs Ministry said in a statement that the agreement will continue the current mutual exemption from visa requirements for Sri Lankans and Hong Kong passport holders.
Hong Kong reverts to Chinese sovereignty on July 1 after more than 150 years of British rule. It will become a Special Administrative Region of China and have its own passport.
